parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240017) at the end. This strongly suggests an attempt at electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used by candidates and are mandated for electoral materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly mention a specific candidate by name, the call to "NU VOTAȚI O ILUZIE CREATĂ DE INTELIGENȚĂ ARTIFICIALĂ" and the overall tone strongly suggest an attempt to influence voters against a particular candidate or party.  The message implies that a specific candidate or party is using AI-generated illusions to manipulate voters. This indirectly refers to a candidate or party, fulfilling the criteria of Article 36 (7) - a, albeit implicitly.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The message is not a private communication; it's intended for public consumption, fulfilling the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to dissuade voters from supporting a specific candidate or party perceived as using AI-generated propaganda. The call to "NU VOTAȚI" directly aims to influence voting behavior, clearly fulfilling the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not adhere to journalistic standards. It lacks objectivity and presents a biased narrative, aiming to sway public opinion rather than providing neutral information. The use of emotionally charged language ("iluzie," "manipulare," "disconfort") further undermines any claim to journalistic integrity.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>While the post is framed as a personal anecdote, its clear call to action ("NU VOTAȚI") and the implicit criticism of a specific candidate or party transcend personal opinion and enter the realm of electoral propaganda. The narrative serves as a vehicle to deliver a politically charged message.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1245080840049294</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, despite its narrative structure, functions as electoral propaganda. The presence of a CMF number, the implicit criticism of a candidate or party using AI-generated illusions, the clear call to not vote for a certain entity, and the paid advertisement format all point towards a violation.  While it doesn't explicitly name a candidate, the indirect reference and the clear intent to influence voting behavior are sufficient to classify it as electoral propaganda. The post's emotional appeal and lack of objectivity further solidify this conclusion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Unspecified</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alexandru Rogobete, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 1245080840049294, care conține un mesaj subiectiv și manipulativ, îndemnând la nevotarea unei entități nedefinite, dar implicit sugerată ca fiind responsabilă de utilizarea inteligenței artificiale pentru propagandă electorală,  prin fraze precum „NU VOTAȚI O ILUZIE CREATĂ DE INTELIGENȚĂ ARTIFICIALĂ!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea negativă a votului, încalcând astfel prevederile legale privind interzicerea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale.  Prezența numărului CMF11240017 întărește suspiciunea de propagandă electorală.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
